# View activation activities

Learn how to view and manage user activation activities in the Ecommerce Portal.

Enter the Ecommerce Portal Setup page and click the Users tab. The following icons are available in the toolbar:

|  | Select the columns to be displayed in the table. |
| --- | --- |
|  | View the table as a grid. |
|  | Refresh the information in the table. |

To view the activation activities of the end users, you must ensure that the Confirmed At and Confirmation Sent At columns in the ![Image: Column_icon.png](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/95f34095-015d-45c1-902c-83cb52c00711?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..Vg0TlPfgzTra1YmgXbZyw-R-1V_Mn4n2lcrYiH31lko) menu are enabled.

-   The Confirmation Sent At column displays the date and time where a user was invited to the portal.

-   The Confirmed At column displays the date and time where a user has confirmed his account by completing the registration.


You can also click the ![Image: user_menu_icon.png](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/39ccee36-4d29-40d7-bd88-05f5f05790a7?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..id1XXYD4T2e9mMzebtJbRWrOeh5Mt2FBsy09JMWIZ1I) icon located in the ACTIONS column to edit, unlock, or delete a user account.
